Subject: Revenge.....On Zardus

From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Skulletron::

       Skulletron coughed up more mechfluid on the ground.

        Skulletron looked up at Torca.

       "I......I......I'm sorry..........." A mechtear started to form in
Skulletron's right optic.

       "I.......I........I mean.........She made me............I was a
pawn...............I was used................She also used another
transformer..........A....." Coughs up mechfluid, "A
female.........Feline..............She was in on.......This.........I
tried.....I tried.....To stop her..........Iron Raptor.....And....*ACK!
ACK!!!*........Zardus........Had this
pla......pla......planned.......all...along..........I.....couldn't stop
it................." Skulletron transformed back into robot mode.

        He started crawling towards Torca.

      "Help.......me..........Help.............meeee............." He said.

         As Skulletron dragged his body along the floor, his torso began to
split!!!  His lower body ripped off, legs and all.

        Mech fluid leaked all over the floor.  Skulletron's legs sat behind,
Skulletron still pulled what was left of his body towards Torca.

       "I.......Don't care........What you do............To
me.....................You....Can remain......Loyal to.......Iron
Raptor..........But........You.......Maximal.......You............Mus
promise me........One thing...........Promise me........That you
will..........Kill..............Kill," Mechfluid continued pouring all over
the place.

         Skulletron's arm began to rip off.

      "Please............Promise me.......That
you'll..........Kill..........Kill...........Kill...............*Stasis lock
immenint*.............You have to
kill............Kill................*5*................Please.......Kill....
.....
*4*......................Please.....You have
to...........*3*..........Kill...........*2*................Kill......Zardus
...
*1*........*Stasis lock will now commence*.......Kill Zardus for what he has
done to me.............You........Prom...i....sed........." Skulletron's
body went into stasis lock.

         But, something happened.

        Skulletron's legs, sitting in a very large puddle of mechfluid,
sparked, and then dissolved into nothing.

         Skulletron's other body pieces dissolved too, except for the head.

         Then, Skulletron's head spoke.

        "Revenge.........Revenge.....Reeevvveeeeennnngeeeeeeeeeee,"
Skulletron's voice began to sound all weird, and then his head exploded.

        Skulletron's spark emerged.  It was blue, and then turned black, and
flew away.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 09, 2000 9:58 PM
Subject: Re: Skulletron Will Live!!


> :::Torca:::
>
> ::He sees all of the things that Skulletron was showing him.  Iron
> raptor was the traitor?  Skulletron was the ally?  Torca did not
> beleive it.  He was a descendant of Optimus Prime(Not moding
> Dachande.  I was in the RPG before you and made Torca a descendent of
> Prime.  please accept this), and shared the common sense that the
> great leader had shown in the past.  he knew that the whole idea was
> foolish::
> Torca: You are a very bad liar Skulletron.  If your our ally why did
> you fire on us?  Let me guess- Iron Raptor made you do it?
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> > ::Skulletron::
> >
> >         Skulletron got hit by Klant's missile, and flew backwards,
> and hit the wall, then fell down to the ground in a sitting position
> against the wall.
> >
> >          Then, Skulletron's chest was continuously pounded by 25
> shots from Torca.
> >
> >          Mechfluid leaked from all over Skulletron, he was almost
> completely covered in it.  Skulletron got up.
> >
> >         "I........." Skulletron coughed up mechfluid, "I'll kill
> you....." He spat out more mechfluid, "If it's...." He wiped
> mechfluid from his mouth, "If it's.......The
> last.....Thing........I.......................Do........." He
> muttered out.
> >
> >           Skulletron then transformed to beast mode.
> >
> >          This would be his only chance to survive.
> >
> >          Skulletron connected his mind with Torca and Klant's mind.
> >
> >          Then, he did what he loved to do.
> >
> >           Skulletron projected an image of himself into Torca and
> Klant's mind.
> >
> >           Then, he sent an image of Iron Raptor into their minds.
> >
> >           Skulletron now put a voice into their heads.
> >
> >           "Maximals.................Stop
> this...this....madness............Skulletron is not the
> enemy......................Iron Raptor is the true
> enemy............................She plotted Dinobot and Tavatron
> getting lost.................She plotted Skulletron coming into the
> base...............You Maximals are blind!!!!!!  No matter how much
> Iron Raptor seems to be on your side, she will always be the
> enemy...............She is using you...........Spare Skulletron's
> life, and attack the real enemy!!!!" The voice said, cold and grim.
> >
> >            Skulletron projected an image of what was going to
> happen to all of them during a big battle, and Iron Raptor laughing
> maniacally.
>
>
>
>
>
